title: Bobby Throws Out First Pitch At Chicago Cubs Game + Lunchbox Returns To The Show
itunes:title: Bobby Throws Out First Pitch At Chicago Cubs Game + Lunchbox Returns To The Show
description:
Bobby recaps his experience throwing out the first pitch at a Chicago Cubs game, and his stepdad ‘Arkansas Keith’ calls in to talk about his highlights from the trip. Lunchbox returns to the show. Also, Amy’s husband isn’t a fan of their son’s new toy. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
